Articles.Content:
Anyone knows how to create a new tech in 1.0 version?

I tried edit TechTree.cfg but it was imposible to create a new technology,

anyone know how it works?

can someone give me an example?

Thanks
I'm pretty sure the best way to support multiple trees on one save is to us ModuleManager to add nodes to the stock tree. I'm not sure how one goes about doing this, though.
